title: Add Google Search Console verification meta tag

requirements.text: Insert the following Google Search Console verification meta tag inside the <head> of the main HTML entry file at frontend/index.html: <meta name="google-site-verification" content="IjrggOYDYzGbpwqvtFNRgEKp8_g0kCeYhwNJnpSwr60" />

quotes:
Add this meta tag inside the head section of my website:

<meta name="google-site-verification" content="IjrggOYDYzGbpwqvtFNRgEKp8_g0kCeYhwNJnpSwr60" />

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html contains exactly one <meta name="google-site-verification" ...> tag with content="IjrggOYDYzGbpwqvtFNRgEKp8_g0kCeYhwNJnpSwr60" inside the <head> element.
The application builds successfully and the tag is present in the rendered document <head> when visiting the site.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not add any additional SEO tags, analytics scripts, or other third-party verification methods beyond the single meta tag requested.
